Reception Pi¶

This module provides program entry point for the Reception Pi.

class reception_pi_app.ReceptionPiApp¶

The ReceptionPiApp class provides the method to start the Reception Pi program.

static run()¶

Fires up the Reception Pi console.

It starts the console UI of the Reception Pi.

Returns

None

This module provides functions to run Reception Pi Console Menu.

class rp_app.rp_console.RpConsole¶

RpConsole class handles the Reception Pi Console Menu function.

menu_items¶

a list of menu items to print.

Type

[str]

menu_end_number¶

the choice number for the last selectable item.

Type

int

start()¶

Starts the console menu

It will continue showing the menu and asking for selection unless the user chooses to quit.

Returns

None

This module provides functionality of user registration.

class rp_app.user_registration.UserRegistration¶

UserRegistration class handles user registration process.

__dao¶

data access object to the local database.

Type

DataAccessLocal

__new_username¶

the entered username.

Type

str, None

__new_fullname¶

the entered full name.

Type

str, None

__new_password¶

the entered password.

Type

str, None

ask_for_fullname()¶

Prompts user to enter the full name

It will continue asking until the required format is met.

Returns

None

ask_for_password()¶

Prompts user to enter the password

It will continue asking until the required format is met. It will also encrypt the password before saving.

Returns

None

ask_for_username()¶

Prompts user to enter the username

It will continue asking until the required format is met and the entered username has been taken.

Returns

None

register_user()¶

Saves the user information to the database

Returns

None

start()¶

Starts the user registration process

It calls a series of other methods to complete the process.

Returns

None

This module provides functionality to handle login process.

class rp_app.user_login.UserLogin¶

UserLogin class handles user login process.

__dao¶

data access object to the local database.

Type

DataAccessLocal

__server_ip¶

the IP address of the Master Pi.

Type

str

__username¶

the username of the logging user.

Type

str, None

__password¶

the password of the logging user.

Type

str, None

ask_for_password()¶

Prompts user to enter the password

Returns

None

ask_for_username()¶

Prompts user to enter the username

Returns

None

login_user()¶

Logs user in

It checks if the username exists, if not then return. It then checks if the password is correct, if not then return. If everything is correct, it sends user info to the Master Pi.

Returns

None

static send_message(msg, server_ip)¶

Sends message to server using sockets

It sends the message to the server and then waits for reply. While waiting, it will pause the program and show ‘Busy’.

Parameters

  • msg – the message to be sent

  • server_ip – the IP address of the server

Returns

None

start()¶

Starts the user login process

It calls a series of other methods to complete the process.

Returns

None

This module provides functions to interact with local database.

class rp_app.data_access_local.DataAccessLocal(connection=None)¶

DataAccessLocal class provides methods to handle common SQL operations.

check_if_user_exists(username)¶

Checks if a username is taken

Parameters

username – username to be checked.

Returns

True if username exists, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

close()¶

Closes the connection

Returns

None

get_password_for_user(username)¶

Retrieves the saved password

Parameters

username – the username whose password is to be returned.

Returns

the saved password.

Return type

str

insert_user(username, fullname, password)¶

Inserts a new user to the database

Parameters

  • username – username

  • fullname – full name

  • password – encrypted password

Returns

None
